trustyai.model.Dataset

class trustyai.model.Dataset

Wrapper class for TrustyAI Datasets.

Create a TrustyAI Dataset from a Pandas DataFrame.

property data

Return the dataset’s data

static from_df(df: DataFrame, outputs: Optional[List[str]] = None) → Dataset

Create a TrustyAI Dataset from a Pandas DataFrame.

Parameters
dfpd.DataFrame

The pandas DataFrame to be converted into a Dataset.

outputsOptional[List[str]]

An optional list of column names that represent model outputs. If not supplied, the right-most column will taken as the model output.

Returns
Dataset
static from_numpy(array: ndarray, outputs: Optional[List[int]] = None) → Dataset

Create a TrustyAI Dataset from a Pandas DataFrame.

Parameters
dfpd.DataFrame

The pandas DataFrame to be converted into a Dataset.

outputsOptional[List[int]]

An optional list of column indeces that represent model outputs. If not supplied, the right-most column will taken as the model output.

Returns
Dataset
